definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="308" y="78"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_huge_fungus"><field name="planted">FALSE</field><comment pinned="false" h="99" w="243">This block represent a crimson fungus, like the ones found in the Crimson Forest biome.This feature should be added during the VEGETAL_DECORATION stage</comment><value name="stem"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.LOG#3</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the stem of the fungus</comment></block></value><value name="hat"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.LEAVES#3</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the hat (or "leaves") of the fungus</comment></block></value><value name="decor"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:HangingCocoa</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the decorative block that can appear inside the fungus cap</comment></block></value><value name="ground"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.GRASS</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the valid ground for the fungus. It cannot generate on other blocks</comment></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We add a biome filter, so that the fungi don't generate outside of the current biome</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">MOTION_BLOCKING_NO_LEAVES</field><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate this feature twice in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">8</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
